Translations.Text: Steqsayen k $ef tlawin. Ini: "Oebbi ad awen Issefhem fellasent. Ayen i wen $oan di Tezmamt, $ef tlawin tigujilin, iwumi ur tefkim ara i sent iuran, u teb$am a tent ta$em. Akked igwerdan imeeyanen. A pbeddem i igujilen s lmizan. Ayen akw txeddmem n lxio, Oebbi, s tidep, Izga Ieoa t

Ma tugad tmeiiut ad as ibru, ne$ ad as iwexxeo urgaz is, ulac u$ilif fellasen ma ufan lemwafaqa garasen. Ppif lemwafaqa. Imdanen, deg iman nnsen d imceooiyen. Ma tgerzem u teezzbem, Oebbi, s tidep, Izga Ieoa ayen txeddmem
Ur tezmirem a ppeddum s lmizan, ger tlawin, xas teb$am. Ihi, ur pmalet yal tumlin a p teooem, amzun d tamejgugelt. Ma tgam ayen ilhan, u teezzbem, s tidep, Oebbi Izga Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ma mfaoaqen, ad I$it Oebbi yal wa, s ooeeq iS. Oebbi Izga d Ajemmal, d Bab n uuwab

N Oebbi i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. Ni$ Nweuua wid iwumi teppunefk Tezmamt, uqbel nnwen, u Nweuua kwen, a peezzbem i Oebbi. Ma tnekoem, ihi, n Oebbi i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. Oebbi Izga d Asaay, d Amaazuz
N Oebbi i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. Nesteqnaa s Oebbi d Awkil
Ma ihwa yaS, a kwen Ikkes a yimdanen! A d Iawi wiyav. Oebbi Izga Izmer i waya
Win ib$an a$ellet n ddunit, ihi, ar Oebbi a$ellet n ddunit akked win n laxeot. Oebbi Izga Issel, Ipwali
